alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Kershaw; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:32AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lancaster, Chesterfield and northeastern Kershaw Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 932 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mt Pisgah, or 21 miles east of Lancaster, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheraw, Pageland, Chesterfield, Cheraw State Park, Northeastern Technical College, Cheraw Municipal Airport, Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, Mt Pisgah, Jefferson, Ruby, Patrick, Mount Croghan, McFarlan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Cheraw Fish Hatchery, Middendorf, Central High School, High Point Fire Station, Tradesville, and Alligator Fire Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
